thread.title: 34 Pork Recipes for Weeknights & Weekend Projects
thread.title_full: 34 Pork Recipes for Weeknights & Weekend Projects

author: Riddley Gemperlein-Schirm
title: 34 Pork Recipes for Weeknights & Weekend Projects
text:
If you like it, save it! 
Save and organize all of the stuff you love in one place. Got it! 
Click the heart, it's called favoriting. Favorite the stuff you like. Got it! ✉ Email 
We talk about roast chicken allll the time as being the roast it, forget it, and have it for dinner weeknight meal of choice. The same goes for pasta. And, heck, even eggs. All the while, here's pork—not getting its due credit. 
Pork is cheap, for the most part. Its tenderloin is arguably easier to handle than roast chicken. And (and!) pork can go two ways: super fast or super slow. Pork is here for your weeknight and weekend needs. Advertisement 
Here are 34 pork recipes for whether you're looking for a speedier supper or something that's a bit more intensive: I'm looking for a weeknight dinner ♥ +
